summary.title: User Login
summary.description:
TARA for User Login for CMS
The Course Management System (CMS) is intended to provide information about available courses.
CMS majorly consists of two modules:
1. Registration - for registering users
2. Login - For authenticating users

data.name: Legitimate User
data.description: User interactions with browser

threats.title: Attacker Impersonates user
threats.description: Attacker may impersonate a user to gain unauthorized access
threats.mitigation: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)

threats.title: Denial of access
threats.description: User may deny having performed certain actions (e.g., course access or registration)
threats.mitigation: Enable secure activity logging with non-repudiation

data.name: Authentication
data.description: User authenticate username and password

threats.title: Weak or stolen credentials
threats.description: Weak Authentication allows identity forgery
threats.mitigation: Use strong password policies + MFA

threats.title: intercept/modify Credentials
threats.description: Credentials could be intercepted or altered in transit
threats.mitigation: Use TLS encryption and input validation

threats.title: Credentials visible
threats.description: If not encrypted, user credentials might be exposed.
threats.mitigation: Mask sensitive fields; avoid verbose error messages

threats.title: Brute-force attack
threats.description: Brute-Force attacks may overload the authentication system
threats.mitigation: Implement rate limiting and account lockout mechanisms

data.name: Course Access
data.description: User can access courses after successful authentication

threats.title: Access rights altered
threats.description: Course permissions can be altered to grant unauthorized access.
threats.mitigation: Validate user access on server-side

threats.title: unauthorized course data access
threats.description: Users might access content not meant for them.
threats.mitigation: Implement granular access control

threats.title: Mass request to load content
threats.description: Repeated course load requests can impact availability.
threats.mitigation: Use caching, load balancing, and monitoring

data.name: Registration
data.description: New user need to be register

threats.title: Fake account registration
threats.description: Fake users may register using forged data
threats.mitigation: Use CAPTCHA and email/OTP verification

threats.title: Registration Data Leaked
threats.description: Sensitive registration data might be leaked.
threats.mitigation: Encrypt data in transit and at rest

threats.title: modify roles or data
threats.description: Data could be modified to alter user roles (e.g., become admin)
threats.mitigation: Server-side validation and access control

threats.title: No audit trail
threats.description: No logging might allow denial of registration actions
threats.mitigation: Log registration with timestamps and IPs

data.name:
Node Server
 (process)
data.description: Node server is responsible for authenticating users and showing user context and transmit relevant information

threats.title: Manipulate Server data
threats.description: Malicious actors might modify data being transmitted or processed.
threats.mitigation: Apply input sanitization and output encoding

threats.title: No tracebility
threats.description: Lack of logging makes it hard to trace user or server actions.
threats.mitigation: Enable request and transaction logging

threats.title: Request overload
threats.description: High load of course/data access requests could crash the server.
threats.mitigation: Apply rate limiting and monitoring

threats.title: Misuse of permissions
threats.description: Flaws in logic may allow a user to escalate their privileges.
threats.mitigation: Enforce Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)

data.name: OTP Generator
data.description: Generates OTP for user authentication

threats.title: Reuse or manipulate OTPs
threats.description: OTP values could be intercepted or reused.
threats.mitigation: Use time-based OTP (TOTP) with short expiry

threats.title: OTP visible in logs or network
threats.description: Unencrypted transmission may expose OTPs.
threats.mitigation: OTP visible in logs or network

threats.title: spamming OTP requests
threats.description: OTP service might be overwhelmed by repeated requests.
threats.mitigation: Rate limit and throttle OTP endpoints

threats.title: Fake OTP generation
threats.description: Malicious clients might try to generate OTPs fraudulently.
threats.mitigation: Link OTPs to session/user context

data.name: Python Server
data.description: Used for verification of data, retrieve of data and to store the data in DATA Base

threats.title: Malicious inputs affecting logic
threats.description: Input manipulation could compromise business logic.
threats.mitigation: Implement input validation and error handling

threats.title: Leaks of internal logic or data
threats.description: Sensitive data might be exposed to unauthorized users.
threats.mitigation: Remove stack traces and sensitive debug info

threats.title: Resource Exhaustion
threats.description: Overloading the service with API calls could cause disruption.
threats.mitigation: Use async processing, rate limiting, health checks

data.name: Data Base
data.description: Data Storage

threats.title: Direct changes to course/user data
threats.description: Attackers could alter stored course/user data.
threats.mitigation: Enable integrity checks, hashing, and logging

threats.title: unauthorized data access
threats.description: Poor access controls might expose data.
threats.mitigation: Encrypt at rest and enforce strict access policies

threats.title: query flooding
threats.description: Excessive queries might lock or crash the database.
threats.mitigation: Use query optimization, throttling, and failover

threats.title: Unauthorized Write Access
threats.description: If misconfigured, users might gain write access.
threats.mitigation: Enforce least privilege, role segregation

data.name: User Credentials
data.description: User credentials transmission

data.name: User Registration Details
data.description: User Registering for access to CMS

data.name: Access Permissions
data.description: User access permissions as per the user verification

data.name: Transmit relevant info
data.description: CMS information as per User access permissions
